errors.invalid_link: This password reset link is invalid or missing. Please request a new one.

errors.token_used: This password reset link has already been used. Please request a new one.
errors.weak_password: Password doesn't meet requirements. Please use at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character.

audit_trail.title: Audit Trail
audit_trail.subtitle: Track organization activity ({{count}} logs)
audit_trail.error_loading: Failed to load audit logs. Please try again.

hero.subtitle: Feature flags, event tracking, and OTA updates for modern mobile apps. Control rollouts, track impact, and iterate faster.

features.title: Everything you need to ship faster
features.subtitle: Feature flags, analytics, and instant updates  all in one powerful platform

feature_flags.title: Feature Flags
feature_flags.description: Control feature rollouts with targeting rules and segments. Gradually release to specific users, test in production, and kill switches when needed.

event_tracking.title: Event Tracking
event_tracking.description: Track user events, payments, errors, and more with rich metadata. Get real-time notifications for critical moments.

ota_updates.title: OTA Updates
ota_updates.description: Push updates instantly without app store review. Target specific users, devices, or environments with conditional rollouts.

segments.title: User Segments
segments.description: Create powerful user segments with flexible rules. Target beta testers, premium users, or any custom cohort.

multi_platform.title: Multi-Platform
multi_platform.description: Native SDKs for TypeScript/JavaScript and Dart/Flutter. Works on web, mobile, and server.

analytics.title: Built-in Analytics
analytics.description: Understand flag impact with evaluation analytics. Track how features perform across different user segments.

feature_flags.label: Feature Flags
feature_flags.title: Control every feature release
feature_flags.description: Ship code when ready, release when confident. Use targeting rules to gradually roll out features to specific user segments.
feature_flags.benefit_3: Multiple value types: boolean, string, number, JSON

events.label: Event Tracking
events.title: Track what matters
events.description: Capture every important moment in your app with structured events and rich metadata.

integration.title: Integrate in minutes, not days
integration.description: Our SDKs are designed to be simple and intuitive. Add feature flags, analytics, and update capabilities to your app with just a few lines of code.

self_hosting.label: Enterprise Ready
self_hosting.title: Deploy on your own infrastructure
self_hosting.description: Keep complete control over your data with self-hosted or on-premises deployment. Perfect for enterprises with strict compliance requirements.
self_hosting.benefit_1: Full data sovereignty  your data never leaves your servers
self_hosting.benefit_4: Seamless integration with your existing infrastructure

cta.title: Ready to ship with confidence?
cta.subtitle: Join developers using Kitbase to control feature rollouts, track events, and ship OTA updates.
